data.name: Villagers and Heroes: The Grand Explorers Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Grand Explorers pack includes all four color variations of the Pyrron Explorer outfit plus some additional goodies.

Enter the gates of Pyrron, the realm of the infamous Stone Lord. Clad yourself in appropriate cave exploration gear to be able to probe the depths of Lord Pyrrus sinister underground caverns. Each Explorer's outfit comes with a complete costume set (hat, outfit, gloves, and boots) as well as a Gnogmentation appearance pack that unlocks the appearance on your entire account to be used whenever you choose by any of your characters.

Pack Contents

This pack contains the following costume sets:
  • Red Explorer's Outfit + Appearance pack
  • Black Explorer's Outfit Set + Appearance pack
  • Blue Explorer's Outfit Set + Appearance pack
  • Brown Explorer's Outfit Set + Appearance pack
Additionally, this pack contains the following consumable items:
  • 5x Extra Sockets to make the gear needed to brave Pyrron
  • 5x Full Heal potions to get you out of those tricky situations

Enter the gates of Pyrron, the realm of the infamous Stone Lord. Clad yourself in appropriate cave exploration gear to be able to probe the depths of Lord Pyrrus sinister underground caverns. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8, 7, Vista, or XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® D or AMD Athlon™ 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: On board graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 8, 7, Vista, or XP
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo 2.2GHz, AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 2.6GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1 GB of memory or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
